评论概述: Great pants but they smell horrible

I've heard that this smell goes away eventually on polyester/spandex materials but I haven't figured out how long yet.

I'm a full time nurse. I wash my scrubs often and on high temps. These pants are excellent. I do not like traditional scrub pants because they're always too long and you end up walking on them which is a huge trip hazard. The last thing I need is to be a patient. The Jogger style helps make them safer. They managed to hold up to a year of work. And it's not that they have holes, but the zipper on the pockets broke. These are excellent pants and I highly recommend them.

评论概述: Good Material, but Runs Really Small
评论详情: I buy men's active pants like this for work bc they're more comfy and (as always) have bigger pockets. I'm typically an XL in men's, but these were way too small - I later ordered XXL and it's still too tight (have not had this issue with other brands). I plan to reorder in 3XL if available and will post an update later. I like the material and it seems roomy enough in the legs if you have thick legs like me. I was a little worried that the cargo-style pockets would look bulky, but they're very low profile and almost blend in with the pants.

My husband needed comfy pants for a hospital stay and he loved these. He’s about 5’10 240 lbs  and because elastic around ankles no problem with length. Pull up the leg if too long. Living in Florida , they were suitable for heat. 🥰
